text: Cassida morondaviana is a species of leaf beetle, situated in the subfamily Cassidinae (tortoise beetles) and the genus Cassida. It was described as a new species in 2007 from specimens collected in Madagascar in 2004. It is named after its type locality of the city of Morondava. ==References== Category:Cassidinae Category:Beetles of Africa Category:Beetles described in 2007
title: Cassida morondaviana
